titles.title: A resolution recognizing the first weekend of May 2008 as "Ten Commandments Weekend".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. (text of measure as introduced: CR 3/14/2008 S2164)

bill.summary:
3/13/2008--Introduced.
Recognizes the first weekend of May 2008 as Ten Commandments Weekend. Celebrates the Ten Commandments as a significant aspect of the national life of the United States.
